text: The Abbeville County Sheriff's Office is a nationally accredited agency and the primary law enforcement agency of Abbeville County, South Carolina, providing the full spectrum of policing services to the entire county. ==Area of Jurisdiction== The Abbeville County Sheriff's Office is tasked with serving the unincorporated parts of Abbeville County, South Carolina with an area of approx. 511 square miles (1,323 km2). ==Uniform Patrol Division== The Uniform Patrol Division responds to calls for service, performs patrols, and provides other necessary law enforcement functions. == References == Category:Sheriffs' offices of South Carolina
title: Abbeville County Sheriff's Department (South Carolina)
